segments.text: I ’ Ve just found a mouse in the house !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ow ! Don ’ t shout so loud . Calm down . Please stop shouting and sit quietly down .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I found a mouse in our house , a grown mouse running around the dinning room .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Now , move the couch around and turn it upside down .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok , I don ’ t want a mouse in our house . We have the tidiest house in the town .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes darling . You are quite right .
segments.speaker: S2
